item.description:
Afterwork Mixer this Thursday February 12th at City Bar inside the Lenox Hotel located at Copley Square!!

For young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Back Bay neighborhood 6:30-9:30pm.


The Afterwork mixer returns this Thursday February 12th. This time we are taking the party to City Bar, a stylish lounge located inside Copley Square's Lenox Hotel. City Bar is known for having the best martinis Boston has to offer! With Presidents day weekend approaching, this will be a great way to end the week while enjoying cocktails with friends as we gear up for the holiday weekend!

Also if you are a new member or have not yet been to an afterwork mixer, I encourage you to come out and see why this is one of the best meetups in Boston. festive weekend in the city!

Meeting Details: We will meet at the front bar , please look for me upon entering, my picture is on the left hand side of the website under the Assistant Organizer section. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND coming early as possible, with winter time in Boston this place will fill up fast!!
Also my phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving. Look forward to seeing you all there!

Steven

Public Transportation

Green Line to Copley
Orange Line to Backbay

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Afterwork Mixer This Thursday!!!
